casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Wade Leon SHAW. No. 22P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 10, 2015. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Wade Leon Shaw, for Shaw, Wade Leon. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 15th of January 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of June 2015."
